name: Traffic Jammers
description:
In Traffic Jammers you manage traffic as badly as you possibly can. You start your journey as an intern, but by causing massive jams, you might have a chance to eventually become the CEO of Traffic Jammers Ltd.

Made for Ludum Dare 40 by @jushiip and @totallagness

Music by @thiefinger

On Ludum Dare site: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/traffic-jammers
